# Deflect, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Force Spells|force]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Duskblade Spells|Duskblade 5]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mage's Tower 

This spell functions like *[[Deflect, Lesser (Spell)|lesser deflect]]*, except that you gain a shield bonus to AC equal to your caster level against attacks made against you that lasts for 1 round/level after the attack which discharges it.
